title: Calories in Conchas
meta_description: Learn calories in conchas, a Mexican sweet bread, with full nutrition facts including carbs, protein, fat, and serving tips under 160 chars.
assumptions: Standard Mexican concha (sweet bread roll with crumbly topping), approx. 60 g each, baked, no added fillings or butter.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bakery, size, recipe, and toppings. Check labels or sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One concha typically contains about 250 kcal, mostly from carbs and some fat in the topping.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged goods.

tweaks.label: Add 1 pat of butter on top

faqs.q: How many calories in one concha?
What are the carbs in conchas?
faqs.a: About 40 g carbs per concha, including 15 g sugars from the topping.
Moderate fat at 8 g per concha, with 3 g saturated from the crumbly topping.

faqs.q: How much protein in a concha?
faqs.a: Around 5 g protein per concha, mainly from the dough.
Low fiber at 1 g per concha; opt for whole grain versions for more.
